caption: This slow song features a male voice singing the main melody at a comfortable pitch. The tone of the voice is emotional. This is accompanied by a bass playing the root notes of the chords. After one line, a synth swell is played. A piano plays the backing chords. The mood of this song is sad. This song can be played in a sad scene in a movie.
